/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. The road is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance.
